entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
